name: FightWoods (PROTOTYPE)
description:
This is a very very early prototype of a game that may not get finished, however I still wanted to upload it just in case I lost interest.  It's a proof of concept for a turn based roguelike system.

I wouldn't recommend actually playing this unless it looked super super interesting or you just love messing around in other people's crappy projects. Though at the same time, there's very little "content", so you won't be out much either.

If you do though, the WSAD and SPACE keys are used to control the entirety of the game. It's likely pretty janky and a bit of a buggy mess lmao

 Any feedback is obviously really appreciated,  I'm a relatively new to game development as of right now and I don't expect anything to be great, so do feel free to give me your thoughts!!
